caption.p: Representative experiment showing inhibition of Alternaria alternata mycelial growth by Cymbopogon citratus essential oil at 0.1 to 1 mg/mL and by the fungicide combination of 25 g/L difenoconazole plus 25 g/L fludioxonil at 0.1, 0.5 and 1 mg/mL, as seen after 8 days of incubation at 22 ± 2 °C.
